attributes.action: Take Notice of Peer Reviewed Research On E Cigarettes
attributes.additional_details:
This petition calls for peer reviewed scientific research by independent scientists and doctors on e cigarettes to be taken notice of in order to quash the proposed regulations by the TPD.

E cigs DO NOT

- Reduce the ability to help people quit smoking effectively
- Act as a gateway for non-smokers
- Re-Normalise smoking
- E-liquids are NOT created to appeal to children

Reference: http://www.ecigclick.co.uk/clive-bates-electronic-cigarette-briefing-a-must-read-document-on-vaping/

E Cigarettes should be embraced and not restricted.
